name: Pig game (Gargantus)
description:
Goal: Survive as hordes of pigs try to surround you
Controls:
Mouse - Look around
Mouse wheel - Change missile range
Space - Launch missile
R - Restart game

Info:
- The goal is to kill as many pigs as possible 
- The pigs try to steal your watermelons, when you lose them all you lose
- You can get back watermelons by killing pigs who have stolen them
- You have 4 ammunition which you can refill by picking up boxes
- You can shoot guided missiles which deal area damage
- The size of the explosion depends on how far the rocket has flied
- As time passes the pig waves get bigger, but you also get some buffs
- If you directly hit a big pig, the explosion gets doubled
